description:
iFertility Pro is the simple but complete tool to control every aspect of your fertility. It will help you determine the fertile days of your monthly cycle as well as keep track of every information related to it. 

Features:

✓ Password protection
✓ Easy to user interface
✓ Export Data

Information that can be stored in the app:

General:
✓ Date
✓ Notes
✓ Flow (Light/Medium/Heavy)
✓ Spotting (Yes/No)
✓ Love Act (Yes/No)

Symptoms: 
✓ Acne (None/Mild/Medium/Severe)
✓ Appetite (None/Mild/Medium/Severe)
✓ Backache (None/Mild/Medium/Severe)
✓ Cramps (None/Mild/Medium/Severe)
✓ Stress (None/Mild/Medium/Severe)

Moods: 
✓ Happy
✓ Sad 
✓ Irritable

Fertility:
✓ Temperature as Notes
✓ Cervical Fluid (None/Dry/Sticky/Egg W/Creamy/Watery) as Notes

Information that the app will provide:
✓ Next period dates (apron)
✓ Graphic Calendar to show most entered details
✓ And many more details.
✓ Help you determine the fertility window based on data that you enter.

This application can be of much use, but it is solely a recreational tool. No information or advice obtained from this application should be relied on as the sole basis for treating or diagnosing conditions, symptoms or illness, and all queries should be directed to a health professional. Do not use this application as an exclusive method to avoid pregnancy or to get pregnant.


★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
If you need assistance please contact us info@gp-imports.com
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
We will be adding additional apps soon!
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
Enjoy!
